21169485,s5,T5,T6,We show here that in vivo ,LptA, and ,LptC," physically interact, forming a stable complex and, based on the analysis of loss-of-function mutations in LptC, we suggest that the C-terminal region of LptC is implicated in LptA binding.",Complex_formation

21169485,s5,T8,T9,"We show here that in vivo LptA and LptC physically interact, forming a stable complex and, based on the analysis of loss-of-function mutations in LptC, we suggest that the C-terminal region of ",LptC, is implicated in ,LptA, binding.,Complex_formation
